name: My Childhood (XuDong Tao)
description:
Do you want to experience different childhoods? Have you think become another type of person when you grow up? Now, it's your choice to decide what kinds of person you want to be and how you will spend your time in childhood.  You wake up and find that you are back to your childhood. Let's build our characteristics and solve any problems in our childhood. 

It's suitable for people who love multiple endings and less stressful games.
